title: Report on TTO Creator Marketplace videos

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Country-Code
headers.description: A country or region code that is associated with the TikTok One Creator Marketplace campaign ( campaign_id ). To obtain a valid country or region code associated with the TikTok One Creator Marketplace campaign, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ and select one code from the returned country_codes .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of a TikTok One Creator Marketplace campaign with a campaign-level invite link or brand-level invite link . To create a campaign and obtain the campaign ID, use /tto/tcm/campaign/create/ .

parameters.name: start_date Conditional
parameters.description: Required when end_date is passed. If you specify both start_date and end_date , the response will include the daily_stats parameter that shows the daily metrics for the specified time range. If you don't specify both start_date and end_date , the response will not include the daily metrics ( daily_stats ). Report start date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (UTC+0 time). The start_date should not be earlier than the campaign creation time. To obtain the campaign creation time, check the create_time returned from /tto/tcm/campaign/create/ or /tto/tcm/campaign/ . Example: 2024-01-01 .

parameters.name: end_date Conditional
parameters.description: Required when start_date is passed. If you specify both start_date and end_date , the response will include the daily_stats parameter that shows the daily metrics for the specified time range. If you don't specify both start_date and end_date , the response will not include the daily metrics ( daily_stats ). Report end date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (UTC+0 time). Example: 2024-02-01 .

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. This field specifies which page of results to retrieve. The number of pages is based on the total number of records and the page_size . Default value: 1. Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. This specifies the number of records (the performance metrics for videos linked to the specified campaign ID) that you try to retrieve for each request. Default value: 25. Value range: 1-100.
